Detailed Description

The main object class.

Responsible for evaluating the geometry pipeline, including caching and drawing of the world-space transformed shape. Can have multiple shapes assigned, though only one can be active at a time.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzObject::DzObject (  ) 

Default Constructor.

DzObject::~DzObject (  )  [virtual]

Destructor.

DzObject::DzObject ( const DzInFile *  file  )  [protected]

For internal use only.

This constructor is called by the Framework when loading from a file so that certain initializations can be skipped that will happen later in the file load process.

Parameters:
file The file from which this object was loaded.

int  index = -1 
) [virtual, slot]

Adds a modifier to the modifier stack.

Parameters:

Returns:
DZ_NO_ERROR on succedd, otherwise and appropriate error code.

void DzObject::beginEdit (  )  [virtual, slot]

Begins an editing operation on this object. Calls beginEdit() on all the modifiers and shapes owned by this object.

DzAbstractBuildGeometryFilter *  filter,

Parameters:

finalGeom The final built geometry
DzVertexMesh * DzObject::buildWSGeometry ( DzNode &  node,
bool  isRender,
DzVertexMesh *  currentCache = NULL 
) [protected, virtual]

Updates the world-space cached geometry for the given node. Applies local modifiers, transforms the geometry into world space, and then applies world space modifiers.

Parameters:
node The node to cache geometry for.
isRender If true, the cached geometry will be render-quality.
currentCache If not NULL, the current cached geometry - this will be recycled if possible.
Returns:
A pointer to the new world-space geometry.
void DzObject::cancelEdit (  )  [virtual, slot]

Cancels an editing operation on this object. Calls cancelEdit() on all the modifiers and shapes owned by this object.

Reimplemented from DzElement.

void DzObject::clearMotionSamples (  ) 

Clear the motion samples

void DzObject::copyFrom ( const DzElement *  source  )  [virtual]

Copies the settings of the given element to this object. If the given element is another DzObject, the modifiers on the two are matched by name and their settings copied.

Parameters:
source The element (should be DzObject-derived) to copy the settings of.

Reimplemented from DzElement.

Copies this object and its modifiers settings to the clipboard.

Returns:
A pointer to a new clipboard which contains this object's settings. The caller is responsible for deleting this object.

bool  isRender = false 
) [virtual, slot]

DzError DzObject::moveModifier ( DzModifier *  modifier,
int  index = -1 
) [virtual, slot]

Moves the modifier from its source obj to this modifier stack. DZ_ILLEGAL_ARGUMENT_ERROR is return if there is not a modifier, the modifier's element parent is not an object, or the modifier is already an element child of this object. This move is not undo able.

Parameters:
modifier The modifier to add to this object's modifier stack.
index The position in the list to insert the modifer. If index is less than 0, the modifier is appended to the end of the list.
Returns:
DZ_NO_ERROR on succeed, otherwise and appropriate error code.
DzError DzObject::moveShape ( DzShape *  shape,
int  index = -1 
) [virtual, slot]

Moves the given shape from its source object to this object. Operation fails if the shape's element parent is not a different dzobject with this shape in its shape list.

Parameters:
shape The shape that will be added to this object's list of possible shapes.
index The position in the list to insert the shape. If index is less than 0, the shape is appended to the end of the list.

file The file that this object was read from.

void DzObject::setStorablePaths ( const QString &  path  )  [virtual]

Creates a subdirectory of the given path with the name of the object, and passes this path the the object's shapes. Also creates a 'modifiers' subdirectory of the new path and passes this to the object's modifiers.

Parameters:
path The subfolder that storables owned by this element should be saved to.

Reimplemented from DzBase.
